shadho.tree.SearchTree¶

class shadho.tree.SearchTree(root=None, values=None, priority=1.0)[source]¶

Container for search trees and their metrics.

Parameters:

root : shadho.tree.SearchTreeNode

The root node of the search tree.

values : list(builtin type)

Values and results generated by the search.

priority : float

The relative importance of searching this tree.

Methods

add_result(param, result[, update_priority]) Add a result to the tree.
assign(assignment) Assign this tree to a compute class.
clear_assignments() Remove all compute class assignments from this tree.
flatten_param(param) Flatten a nested dictionary.
generate() Generate a set of values from this tree.
set_root(root) Set the root node of the tree.
update_priority() Update the priority approximation for this tree.
write() Write this tree and its results to file.
__init__(root=None, values=None, priority=1.0)[source]¶
add_result(param, result, update_priority=True)[source]¶

Add a result to the tree.

Records results to the tree and updates priority if necessary.

Parameters:

param : dict

The hyperparameter values associate with this result.

result : dict

The results to record.

update_priority : {True, False}

Whether or not to update the priority.
assign(assignment)[source]¶

Assign this tree to a compute class.

clear_assignments()[source]¶

Remove all compute class assignments from this tree.

flatten_param(param)[source]¶

Flatten a nested dictionary.

Parameters:

param : dict

The dictionary, possibly nested, to flatten.
Returns:

flat : dict

param flattened to contain no nested dictionaries.
generate()[source]¶

Generate a set of values from this tree.

set_root(root)[source]¶

Set the root node of the tree.

This function also calculates/sets the complexity of the tree.

update_priority()[source]¶

Update the priority approximation for this tree.

This function implements Algotihm 2 from REFERENCE.

Parameters:None
Returns:None
write()[source]¶

Write this tree and its results to file.
